title: Game Selection
body:
Just thinking, wouldn't it be better if the game selection came first, kinda like the old client, because:
1. If you are playing solo, its much more streamlined approach to playing a game
2. If you are in a group queue, either
a. you have already decided what game mode to play in a chat
b. if you haven't decided, this way when you do invite a person to play a random match with, its your intentional game mode that as the group leader want to play, and makes the decision easier for the random person weather or not they wish to join

replies.body: I believe they have done it this way because Classic is the most popular, not just that but would you prefer someone to jump straight into a ranked without warming up in a norms? I always play at least 3 norms before I start playing ranks for the rest of the day.
